name: London Office
overview:
Why have a Virtual Office in London? Are you starting a new business and want to have a London Virtual Office. Many enterprising people are starting businesses from home but don’t want the inconvenience of advertising their home address. Our Virtual London Address Service allows you mail forwarding plus the use of our prestige addresses on your letter headings, website and business cards, whilst also receiving the benefits of a Telephone Answering service.

Are you trading successfully in other parts of the UK but want to expand your business into the Greater London area? Are you based abroad but want to break into the UK market? We offer you our Virtual London Office and the ability to use it on your marketing material, business cards and website.

Virtual Office London is a package of services that allows you all the benefits of a full time receptionist to handle your calls and mail. In addition to sorting your mail our virtual assistants represent your company as their own, answering your allocated London number live in your company name.

Virtual Office London can either patch the call through or take a message which is sent to you by text or email. we can also give you a fax number where any incoming faxes are sent to you as an email attachment.
